clues.text: In "On Writing" this horror author wrote about his early life in Maine & gave advice to aspiring novelists

(Kelly of the Clue Crew shows some structural formulas on the monitor.)  Alkanes are organic compounds that have carbon atoms arranged in a row; C2H6is ethane; add one carbon & two hydrogens to get C3H8,thisbackyard barbecue staple
